main_question: what was the difference in percentage cumulative return on investment for united parcel service inc . compared to the s&p 500 index for the five year period ended 12/31/09?
final_agent_answer:
The percentage change in cumulative return on investment over the five-year period is as follows:

- **UPS Percentage Change:** \(-24.05\%\)
- **S&P 500 Index Percentage Change:** \(2.11\%\)

The difference in percentage cumulative return between UPS and the S&P 500 Index is:

\[
\text{Difference} = -24.05\% - 2.11\% = -26.16\%
\]

Therefore, the difference in percentage cumulative return on investment for United Parcel Service, Inc. compared to the S&P 500 Index for the five-year period ended 12/31/09 is \(-26.16\%\).
